title: Sean Bonner from Safecast
itunes:title: Sean Bonner from Safecast
description:
One of my only guests who has done a TED Talk, Sean Bonner is the guest on the show this week. He previously worked at Victory Records, ran a independent record label and now runs a radiation testing device company called Safecast. Needless to say, the dude has done a lot and he was kind enough to sit down with me to discuss context, hacking and record label life. Brought to you EXCLUSIVELY by Revelation Records and their three new releases from Down To Nothing, Title Fight and The Rival Mob. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
